name: Stick'n Rudder Aero Tours
about: Stick'n Rudder Aero Tours offers a unique flying experience, specializing in sightseeing rides and flight instruction over the stunning lower Cape Cod area. Based at Chatham Airport, our tours provide a bird's eye view of magnificent beaches, ocean breakthroughs, and local harbor seals. Our professional pilots guide you through historic sites such as the wreck of the SS James Longstreet and the Provincetown Monument, sharing Cape Cod history and answering questions. We operate both a Cessna Skyhawk, accommodating up to three passengers, and a Waco YMF5 Biplane for a more intimate, two-passenger experience. Whether you choose a quick jaunt or an extended flight, our tours are designed to offer breathtaking views and an unforgettable experience. Join us to see Cape Cod from a new and exciting perspective.
